mapper.select: SELECT CC.COMMUNITY_COMMENT_ID, CC.COMMUNITY_ID, CC.USER_ID, CC.POST_ID, CC.COMMENT_CONTENT, CC.COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, CC.COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_COMMUNITY_COMMENT CC JOIN TBL_USER U ON CC.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} ORDER BY CC.COMMUNITY_COMMENT_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMUNITY_COMMENT(COMMUNITY_COMMENT_ID, USER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, POST_ID) VALUES(SEQ_COMMUNITY_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, #{postId})
